Detailed Description

Equals the spirit:busDefinition element in IP-Xact specification.

BusDefinition is one of the top-level elements in IP-Xact and is used to describe high-level aspects of a bus.

VLNV BusDefinition::getExtends (  )  const

Get the vlnv tag of the bus definition that this definition extends.

If this definition does not extend any other definition then returns 0

Returns:
A pointer to the extended vlnv. 0 if no vlnv is extended.

const QStringList BusDefinition::getDependentFiles (  )  const [virtual]

Get the file dependecies of this busDefinition.

This function returns always empty QStringList because busDefinition only has VLNV dependencies. This function exists because the base class function is pure virtual function.

Returns:
QStringList empty list.

Implements LibraryComponent.

Definition at line 287 of file busdefinition.cpp.

const QList< VLNV > BusDefinition::getDependentVLNVs (  )  const [virtual]

Get the VLNVs that this busDefinition needs.

This function returns list of pointers to VLNVs that are needed by this busDefinition.

Returns:
QList containing the VLNVs.

Implements LibraryComponent.

void BusDefinition::write ( QFile &  file  )  [virtual]

Write the document contents into file.

Prints all information stored in this document into specified file generating a valid IP-Xact document.

Parameters:
file A reference to QFile instance representing the file to write the data into.
Exceptions:
Write_error Occurs if the class or one of it's subclasses is not valid IP-Xact at the moment of writing.

Implements LibraryComponent.
